trans-unit.source: Specifies the locations within the configuration-file hierarchy that can set or override the properties contained within a <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Anger platser i hierarkin configuration-fil som kan ange eller åsidosätta egenskaper som ingår i en <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection"> </xref> objekt.

trans-unit.source: The values in this enumeration are optionally used when creating a new instance of the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection> class.
trans-unit.target: Värdena i den här uppräkningen är eventuellt används när du skapar en ny instans av <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection>klassen.</xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection>
Den <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection"> </xref> kan definieras var som helst.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection"></xref> can be defined only in the Machine.config file.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection"> </xref> kan definieras endast i filen Machine.config.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection"></xref> can be defined in either the Machine.config file, the machine-level Web.config file found in the same directory as Machine.config, or the top-level application Web.config file found in the virtual-directory root, but not in subdirectories of a virtual root.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection"> </xref> kan definieras i antingen filen Machine.config datornivå Web.config-filen finns i samma katalog som Machine.config, eller på den översta nivån programmets Web.config-file hittades i virtuella rotkatalog, men inte i underkataloger i en virtuell rot.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection"></xref> can be defined in either the Machine.config file or the machine-level Web.config file found in the same directory as Machine.config, but not in application Web.config files.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection"> </xref> kan definieras i filen Machine.config eller Web.config-filen datornivå finns i samma katalog som Machine.config, men inte i programmets Web.config-filer.
